summary.para: Sets construction variables for the Portable Document Format builder.

Builds a .pdf file from a .dvi input file (or, by extension, a .tex, .ltx, or .latex input file). The suffix specified by the &cv-link-PDFSUFFIX; construction variable (.pdf by default) is added automatically to the target if it is not already present. Example:
summary.example_commands: # builds from aaa.tex env.PDF(target = 'aaa.pdf', source = 'aaa.tex') # builds bbb.pdf from bbb.dvi env.PDF(target = 'bbb', source = 'bbb.dvi')

summary.para: The prefix used for PDF file names.
The suffix used for PDF file names.
